verbose_text: Our results are consistent with previous work showing that constitutive Notch1 activation (via expression of the Notch1 intracellular domain) in trunk mesoderm derived somite cells promotes adoption of a perivascular fate at the expense of a skeletal muscle fate; they also extend this finding to cranial neural crest derived cells.
evidence: Notch1 activation (via expression of the Notch1 intracellular domain) in trunk mesoderm-derived somite cells promotes adoption of a perivascular fate
